# OChat - Anonymous Chat Platform

> Anonymous chat made simple. No signup, no tracking, just honest conversations.

## Use Cases

- [Anonymous Feedback Collection](https://ochat.fun/?use=feedback): Collect honest feedback from employees, students, or customers without revealing identities
- [Confessions & Venting](https://ochat.fun/?use=confessions): Share thoughts, feelings, or secrets anonymously in a judgment-free space
- [Whistleblowing & Reporting](https://ochat.fun/?use=whistleblowing): Report workplace concerns or issues safely without identity exposure
- [Mental Health Support](https://ochat.fun/?use=support): Seek help, advice, or just someone to talk to without revealing who you are
- [Anonymous Q&A Sessions](https://ochat.fun/?use=qa): Host anonymous question sessions for events, classes, or community meetings
- [Sensitive Discussions](https://ochat.fun/?use=sensitive): Discuss private matters without leaving digital footprints or compromising privacy
- [Event Feedback](https://ochat.fun/?use=event-feedback): Gather honest opinions after meetings, presentations, or workshops
- [Customer Support Chat](https://ochat.fun/?use=support-chat): Provide temporary customer support without requiring account creation

## Key Features

- **Instant Chat Link Creation**: Generate a shareable chat link in one click - no signup required
- **Complete Anonymity**: Zero data collection, no tracking, no personal information needed
- **Real-time Messaging**: WebSocket-powered instant message delivery with typing indicators
- **Auto-deletion**: Messages automatically delete after 24 hours for enhanced privacy
- **Offline Support**: Messages queue when offline and send automatically when reconnected
- **Multi-conversation Management**: Chat creators can manage multiple anonymous conversations simultaneously
- **Cross-platform**: Works on any device with a web browser - no app installation needed
- **Free Forever**: Completely free service with no premium tiers, ads, or hidden costs

## How It Works

### For Chat Creators:
1. Visit ochat.fun and click "Create New Chat Link"
2. Share your unique link (e.g., ochat.fun/?link=link_abc123)
3. Receive and respond to anonymous messages in real-time
4. Manage multiple anonymous conversations from one dashboard

### For Anonymous Users:
1. Receive or find an OChat link
2. Click the link (or paste the link ID on ochat.fun)
3. Start chatting immediately - no signup needed
4. Your identity remains completely private

## Privacy & Security

- **No Personal Data Collection**: OChat doesn't collect names, emails, IP addresses, or any identifying information
- **No Tracking Cookies**: No analytics, no cookies, no user behavior tracking
- **Temporary Storage**: All messages auto-delete after 24 hours - nothing stored permanently
- **Anonymous by Design**: System architecture prevents identity linking between conversations
- **Client-side Caching**: Conversations stored locally on your device only, never on our servers beyond 24 hours
- **No Message Ownership**: Messages aren't tied to accounts, profiles, or any persistent identity

## Technical Specifications

- **Frontend**: React.js, Socket.IO client, Axios, LocalStorage API
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express.js, Socket.IO server
- **Architecture**: Real-time WebSocket communication with REST API
- **Hosting**: Render (backend), Static hosting (frontend)
- **Message Retention**: 24 hours maximum, then auto-deleted
- **Uptime**: 99.9% availability target

## Comparison to Alternatives

- **Simpler than Omegle**: No random matching - direct link-based conversations only
- **More private than social media DMs**: Zero data collection, no identity requirements, auto-deletion
- **Easier than Telegram**: No app download, no phone number, no account creation needed
- **More focused than Discord**: Purpose-built for anonymous one-on-one conversations
- **Safer than email**: No email addresses exchanged, stored, or exposed
